name: Treasure Diver
description:
Welcome to Treasure Diver!

Unfortunately the in game documentation does detail too well how to play. 

You start next to a large lake! You must jump in the lake and collect as much treasure as possible! However, your air tanks are limited and you can only go for a certain amount of time. Further, the more treasure you carry, the slower you will go!

To the right of the lake is a store that will refill your oxygen tanks, as well as upgrade both your oxygen and your speed.

The further down you go, the more the treasures are worth! Not only that, some creatures down there pose a threat to you!

Made for the 8th Alakajam.
